review: Just bought it tried to play it- no go . Tried to stop it -no go . checked forums -no help . deleted game . much better . another to add to the list of games which dont work from steam.
This game is terrible costs a lot and doesnt work . Do yourselves a favour and avoid it like the plague . Summation : crap
This seems to be a simplistic game but it has real strategic depth and is extremely difficult to win though victory is possible
